Text_Spanish: No tiene nada del otro mundo

Text_English: I see no reason for doing that
Text_Spanish: No veo razón para hacer eso

Text_English: I don't get it - Too complicated
Text_Spanish: No lo pillo - Es demasiado complicado
Ya le di una vuelta a aquello

Text_English: This mistery is a hard puzzle to solve
Text_Spanish: Este misterio es un gran rompecabezas que resolver

Text_English: Victim is definitely gone! They all claim he was poisoned
Text_Spanish: La víctima definitivamente ha sucumbido! Todos dicen que ha sido envenenado
